channel.title: CVE Feed for creativethemeshq -- Blocksy Companion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for creativethemeshq -- Blocksy Companion

item.title: CVE-2024-4487|2024-05-11T07:40:48.645Z -- creativethemeshq -- Blocksy Companion
item.description: The Blocksy Companion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG uploads in versions up to, and including, 2.0.45 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2392|2024-03-22T01:59:59.696Z -- creativethemeshq -- Blocksy Companion
item.description: The Blocksy Companion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Newsletter widget in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.31 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
